reviewtext: I bought two of these headphones for my kids to use on a cross-country car trip so I wouldn't be driven witless by sounds of whatever they were watching.  It's not a bad thing for parents to want to listen to their own music or the radio in the car, but the rules of parenting these days can try to make you feel like you're terrible for not wanting a full immersion of childhood all over again.  We checked out the volume on these and with the noise of the car, they were not uncomfortably loud.  They are a little big for younger kids, but better to have than the earbuds I think.
